title: Place of work
h1: What address did you work at?

addressPostcode.invalid: Enter a valid postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
addressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA

workAddress1.required: Enter a building and street for your work address up to 100 characters

workAddressTown.required: Enter a town or city for your work address up to 60 characters

workAddressPostcode.required: Enter a postcode. For example, SW1 1AA
